newsitem.title: GERMANY: Porsche to announce dividend on Friday.
newsitem.headline: Porsche to announce dividend on Friday.

text.p: German luxury sportscar maker Porsche AG said on Tuesday that it would release on Friday details for its anticipated resumption of a dividend payout.

Porsche said its supervisory board would hold a meeting on Thursday to discuss resuming the dividend payout after it last paid one for its 1991/92 business year of 2.50 marks per 50 mark nominal value share.
Ordinary shareholders will receive no dividend.
The dividend payout is being resumed after Porsche turned in higher-than-expected profits for the 1995/96 business year.
